      • offset

        public static java.util.List<? extends Detectable> offset(java.util.List<? extends Detectable> detectables,
                                                          Point offset)
        Offset a list of objects, translating them by a specific offset point
        Parameters:
        detectables - List of detectables
        offset - Point to offset by, e.g. (1, 0) would move objects 1 px right
        Returns:
        Modified list of detectables
